statements: SELECT * FROM pest_and_disease_outbreaks ORDER BY outbreak_date DESC;
SELECT pest_name, SUM(affected_area) FROM pest_and_disease_outbreaks GROUP BY pest_name;
SELECT * FROM pest_and_disease_outbreaks WHERE disease_name = 'Powdery Mildew';
SELECT AVG(affected_area) AS avg_area_affected FROM pest_and_disease_outbreaks;
SELECT pest_name, COUNT(*) AS total_outbreaks FROM pest_and_disease_outbreaks GROUP BY pest_name ORDER BY total_outbreaks DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM pest_and_disease_outbreaks ORDER BY outbreak_date DESC, affected_area DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, pest_name, disease_name, affected_area FROM pest_and_disease_outbreaks WHERE pest_name = 'aphids' OR disease_name = 'blight';
SELECT * FROM pest_and_disease_outbreaks WHERE outbreak_date >= '2021-01-01' AND outbreak_date <= '2021-12-31' ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT pest_name) AS pest_count, AVG(affected_area) AS avg_affected_area FROM pest_and_disease_outbreaks GROUP BY disease_name ORDER BY avg_affected_area DESC;
SELECT id, pest_name, disease_name, outbreak_date, affected_area FROM pest_and_disease_outbreaks WHERE affected_area > 1000 ORDER BY outbreak_date ASC, affected_area DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM pest_outbreaks WHERE severity_level > 3;
SELECT pest_name, location FROM pest_outbreaks WHERE location LIKE 'California%';
SELECT id, pest_name, severity_level FROM pest_outbreaks WHERE severity_level BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT * FROM disease_outbreaks WHERE outbreak_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT disease_name, affected_crops FROM disease_outbreaks WHERE affected_crops LIKE '%corn%';
SELECT * FROM pest_outbreaks WHERE severity_level > 3 ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT pest_name, COUNT(*) AS occurrence FROM pest_outbreaks GROUP BY pest_name HAVING occurrence > 1
SELECT outbreak_date, severity_level FROM pest_outbreaks WHERE severity_level BETWEEN 1 AND 3 ORDER BY outbreak_date DESC
SELECT * FROM pest_outbreaks WHERE location LIKE '%valley%'
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS count FROM pest_outbreaks GROUP BY location HAVING count > 2
SELECT * FROM pest_outbreaks;
SELECT outbreak_id, pest_name, outbreak_date FROM pest_outbreaks WHERE outbreak_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT pest_name, COUNT(*) AS total_outbreaks FROM pest_outbreaks GROUP BY pest_name;
SELECT * FROM disease_outbreaks ORDER BY outbreak_date DESC;
SELECT farmer_name, contact_number FROM farmer_reports WHERE report_date > '2022-03-01';
SELECT * FROM pest_outbreaks ORDER BY outbreak_date ASC, pest_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT outbreak_id, pest_name FROM pest_outbreaks WHERE outbreak_date between '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT farmer_name, contact_number FROM farmer_reports JOIN disease_outbreaks ON disease_outbreaks.outbreak_id = farmer_reports.reported_outbreak_id WHERE disease_name = 'Malaria';
SELECT DISTINCT affected_crops FROM pest_outbreaks UNION SELECT DISTINCT affected_crops FROM disease_outbreaks;
SELECT COUNT(outbreak_id) AS pest_outbreak_count, pest_name FROM pest_outbreaks GROUP BY pest_name ORDER BY pest_outbreak_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM pest_outbreaks ORDER BY outbreak_date DESC;
SELECT pest_name, affected_area FROM pest_outbreaks WHERE affected_area > 500;
SELECT farm_name, location FROM farm_locations WHERE owner_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT farmer_name, contact_number FROM farmer_records WHERE farm_id = 1;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date FROM crop_plantings WHERE planting_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM pest_outbreaks WHERE affected_area > 1000 ORDER BY outbreak_date DESC
SELECT pest_name, outbreak_date FROM pest_outbreaks WHERE outbreak_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT farm_name, owner_name FROM farm_locations WHERE location = 'California'
SELECT farmer_name, contact_number FROM farmer_records WHERE farm_id = 3
SELECT crop_name, planting_date FROM crop_plantings ORDER BY planting_date ASC
SELECT * FROM Farmers;
SELECT farmer_name, contact_number FROM Farmers ORDER BY farmer_name DESC;
SELECT pest_name, outbreak_date FROM PestOutbreaks WHERE severity > 3.0;
SELECT outbreak_id, disease_name, affected_crops FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE outbreak_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT field_id, field_size, crop_planted, farmer_name FROM FarmFields JOIN Farmers ON FarmFields.farmer_id = Farmers.farmer_id;
SELECT * FROM PestOutbreaks WHERE severity > 3.0;
SELECT outbreak_id, pest_name FROM PestOutbreaks WHERE outbreak_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT farmer_name, location FROM Farmers ORDER BY farmer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM FarmFields WHERE crop_planted = 'Corn' AND field_size > 50.0;
SELECT plan_id, action_taken, completion_date FROM TreatmentPlans WHERE completion_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY completion_date ASC;
